casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Lee CAMPBELL. No. 300P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of June 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review Pursuant to N.C. 7A-28":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
